item.title: Official Hige Dandism - Subtitle
item.description: “Subtitle” is a Japanese song by the band Official Hige Dandism, released on their album “Traveler” in 2019. The song is a blend of pop, rock, and jazz genres, featuring upbeat instrumentation and catchy melodies. The lyrics of “Subtitle” express the feeling of being lost in life and the search for one’s purpose. The protagonist of the song is depicted as feeling disconnected from the world around them, but ultimately finds hope and determination to move forward.
